game.name: MOVERS IN THE WAREHOUSE
game.shortDescription: MOVERS IN THE WAREHOUSE is a puzzle game about workers in a warehouse with strategy and arcade elements, made in a 2D drawn style.
game.shortDescriptionEn: MOVERS IN THE WAREHOUSE is a puzzle game about workers in a warehouse with strategy and arcade elements, made in a 2D drawn style.

reviewHighlights.text: Lucky me gets to write the first review for "MOVERS IN THE WAREHOUSE", a GameMaker Studio template flip from asset flip scammers, Piece of Voxel. MOVE...
1/10 one of those games that they slap an insane steam price on and sell in bundles for next to nothing and its worth that much
